structure.description: The main reason for carrying out salvage operations is to minimise or prevent further loss to property at incidents
When the OIC Fire orders salvage operations to commence, the officer is attempting to reduce damage to property by limiting the damage caused by what factors?
What methods can be used to reduce damage from sprinkler systems?
options: Floor isolation and main sprinkler valves.
Place absorbent material beneath activated sprinkler heads
correctAnswer: Floor isolation and main sprinkler valves.
Place absorbent material beneath activated sprinkler heads
